This proliferation of MPs has to do with 2 attitudes of the gov. interim and somewhat worrisome: blatant violation of what was decided by the TCU (...)
(...) and dismantling of social policies that went through the screening of the polls in 2014.
Despite the crises that Greece faced, it remains a pillar of security and stability in the region in a period of instability. 1/2
The 2 main labor measures that the interim government is proposing are very serious.
Problem of outsourcing is "pejotizing" workers who do not have this working relationship, you reduce social security and labor obligations
There is the intention of reducing the guarantees of work achieved over decades by the Brazilian population.
Let's not forget that the proposal that passed in the Chamber was the absolute "pejotização".
The second question is the primacy of the agreed on the legislated. Today, what is in the law defines labor relations.
There is a need to strengthen the role of our country. Meeting with the Minister US Finance Mr. Jack Liu. 2/2 https://t.co/ywlRQcDbPa
They want to transform agreements into bigger instruments than legislation.
You can have in a process of strong unions a trade union negotiation in which the worker achieves a positive flexibility.
This does not occur in the set of labor relations throughout the country.
When you talk about prioritizing agreed upon legislation, you weaken the bargaining conditions of the worker.
I find it very dangerous to make such modifications. I do not believe this will result in increased productivity of the economy.
Since the election of 14, the opposition opens the 3rd shift. They asked for recount of votes and audit at the polls. No irregularities were found.
They try not to be a graduate and start with the "agenda bomb" in Congress. The commissions in 2016 did not work, they were not even named.
The coup consists of two things: stopping the bloodletting, preventing the #LavaJato's investigations from reaching them. My gov would not interrupt.
Second, to implement a government program that would deplete everything we had done. #SUS does not fit the budget, according to them.
We have a great chance to reverse the impeachment process, the senators have a very strong level of responsibility, they are great leaders.
Senators have the ability to take responsibility vertically. The charge is very fragile. Cunha accepted the suit for revenge.
We need to rethink a national pact, with the strengthening of democracy, the defense of sovereignty, non-ideological foreign policy ...
I do not usually comment on research, but a fact should be looked at. A difference of 3% to 62% in relation to what the population is not trivial.
It is not an oversight, which is unfortunate, because everyone had this research institute in high regard.
There is no injustice greater than being unjustly condemned for wrong, misrepresented, non-criminal.
There is a machista and misogynist component in this coup. The sensibility of the people is confused with the fragility; strength with lack of heart.
Women are the ones who fight the most. The ones that provide the most support, affection, political and personal welcome. The youngsters.
I am soooo proud of my children, Don, Eric and Tiffany - their speeches, under enormous pressure, were incredible. Ivanka intros me tonight!
